rules.natural: If Procurement specifies the material, then should Procurement order the furniture, the Warehouse does not receive the furniture.
If Procurement confirms the material specification, then Management approves the material.
Either Compliance investigates Procurement or Internal Audit audits Procurement.

rules.prover9_expression: (audits(InternalAudit, Procurement) -> (-(rejects(Management, Material) | (orders(Procurement, Furniture) -> -receives(Warehouse, Furniture))) -> escalates(Procurement, Management)))
rules.natural: If Internal Audit audits Procurement, then provided that neither Management rejects the material nor does Procurement's furniture ordering lead to non-receipt by the Warehouse, Procurement escalates to Management.
If Procurement violates the policy, then HR does not investigate Procurement.
If HR disciplines the Procurement staff, then HR investigates Procurement.
If Management approves the technology, then the IT Department implements the technology.
If the Accounting Department requests the technology, then should the Accounting Department use the financial product, efficiency improves for financial operations.
If Management reviews the technology, then Management approves the technology.
Either Management reviews the technology or the Accounting Department submits the technology request.
If the Accounting Department submits the technology request, then the Accounting Department requests the technology.
If Procurement orders the furniture, then the Warehouse receives the furniture.
Either Procurement orders the furniture or the IT Department does not delay the implementation.
If it is not the case that Management rejects the material or that Procurement ordering furniture leads to non-receipt by the Warehouse, then Procurement does not escalate to Management.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(investigates(Compliance, Procurement) -> (-(rejects(Management, Material) | (orders(Procurement, Furniture) -> -receives(Warehouse, Furniture))) -> escalates(Procurement, Management))) -> sanctions(Management, Procurement))
rules.natural: If it is not true that Compliance investigating Procurement leads to the situation where, unless Management rejects the material or furniture ordering causes non-receipt, Procurement escalates to Management, then Management sanctions Procurement.
Provided that Procurement violating the policy does not result in HR disciplining the Procurement staff, then HR terminates the Procurement staff.
If the failure of Procurement not specifying the material to lead to Management approving the material occurs, then Procurement violates the policy.
If Procurement does not specify the material, then Procurement confirms the material specification.
If efficiency does not improve for financial operations, then the IT Department delays the implementation.

facts.natural: The Accounting Department uses the financial product.
Management does not approve the material.
Management does not reject the material.
The IT Department does not implement the technology.
HR does not terminate the Procurement staff.
